author: Anthony Trivinia
comment: The app is very well designed and works great. The dev reached out to me to fix the counter issue I was having. They fixed it the same day. I will recommend this app to every smoker I know.

reply.author: TedSoft
reply.content:
Hello Anthony,
I am sorry for the late response. What do you mean by not being sorted properly...it should be sorted chronologically and that is what I get on my device. Please send me a specific example to: tedsoft.dev@gmail.com
Right now, the entries cannot be edited however you can delete individual entries by swipe to delete.

Have a nice day

title: Great app!

author: Adam Kurylo
comment: Beautiful app. I love the look and feel. Crashes all the time

reply.author: TedSoft
reply.content:
Hello Adam, 
I am sorry for the late feedback. The issue should now be fixed.

Have a nice day,
TedSoft

title: Beautiful app

comment: Doesn't register the dates I input for some reason, note 5. Uninstalled

reply.author: TedSoft
reply.content:
Hello, 
I am very sorry for the late response. The issue should be fixed in the latest update (2.4).

Have a nice day,
TedSoft
